title: Live Lyrics Finder
description: Real-time lyrics synced with Spotify playback.
details: Built with React and Tailwind CSS, this app uses the Spotify API to fetch and display lyrics in sync with the currently playing song.

title: MAASS

details: Integrates MediaPipe for gesture recognition and Gemini API for natural language processing, supporting multiple input methods.

title: ASL Letter Recognizer
description: A real-time American Sign Language letter detection system using MediaPipe and TensorFlow for live webcam input.
details: Uses Python, OpenCV, and TensorFlow to detect ASL letters from webcam input with high accuracy in real-time.

title: Text Summarizer
description: A Python-based NLP project to summarize long texts using techniques like frequency-based and BERT-based models.
details: Implements TextRank and BERT models for efficient text summarization, ideal for processing large documents.

title: AeroTrack
description: A hyperlocal air quality visualizer and forecasting system built with React, Flutter, and AI/ML technologies.
details: AeroTrack combines real-time AQI data, satellite overlays, and AI-based forecasting to deliver meaningful air quality insights. It supports map heatmaps, predictive analytics, health tips, reverse geocoding, offline PWA support, and emergency response features for underserved regions.
